intro: Pirate: Argghhhh! Mate, this be an excellent first target. i have heard tales o' burried gold and fountains o' rum, i shall take this city! Splice the mainbrace! This be me desteny!
Parrot: Oh, mate, ye scurvey dog! th' sea seems t' be standin' in yer way! Do ye see those blocks o' sea salt? ye shall destroy them t' get t' th' city!
Pirate: Ahoy, Matey! Get th'  Chase Gun ready. Let's destroy th' obstacles. Fire in the Hole!
